title: Frozen Margarita
description: The classic cocktail.  This is the recipe from scratch, though there's no shame in using a decent quality premix, IMHO.

ingredients.notes: For rimming glass.  Tajin makes a nice substitution too.
Totally optional, but this makes a very tasty floater.

instructions: Run lime wedge around rim of two glasses.
Roll rim in kosher salt or Tajin.
Combine tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and simple syrup in blender and blend until smooth.
Optionally: Add 1 ounce of Ancho liquor to each glass - do not stir.
notes: Single servings work fine in a personal blender - just halve the ingredients.  Also, a rim of Tajin, rather than salt, is a very nice change.
